title: Ep. 252: Why Fragrance is Like Wine & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:title: Ep. 252: Why Fragrance is Like Wine & The Week’s Beauty News
itunes:subtitle: Find out how perfume ages and why that can change a scent for the better or worse. Plus, we’re sharing our favorite Crabtree & Evelyn products and the story of the brand’s evolution (in a segment sponsored by Crabtree & Evelyn). And, as always,...
description:
Find out how perfume ages and why that can change a scent for the better or worse. Plus, we’re sharing our favorite Crabtree & Evelyn products and the story of the brand’s evolution (in a segment sponsored by Crabtree & Evelyn). And, as always, we’ve got lots of news to discuss: a beauty initiative aimed at ending intimate partner violence; the latest celebrity beauty lines (yes, there are more!); and, in Jenn’s science corner, new research about the skin benefits of topical CBD. -- Want more of our beauty podcast? Episode Recaps & Notes: fatmascara.com/blog; Our Private Facebook Group: Fat Mascara / Raising a Wand; Instagram: @fatmascara, @jessicamatlin, @jenn_edit; Twitter: @fatmascara; Email: info@fatmascara.com; To Leave a Voicemail & Be Featured on a Future Episode: 646-481-8182.

Become a member at https://plus.acast.com/s/fatmascara.


Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
